ch5-background.description: Added automatically on the ch5-background element
Added automatically on the first parent of the ch5-background element

ch5-modal-dialog.description: the class added on the div that is the only direct child of the ch5-modal-dialog element and wraps all its contents
modal section (a div) that wraps the prompt-icon and the prompt-text
class added on the mask element
wrap the html that is initially between the ch5-modal-dialog tags

ch5-overlay-panel.description: Applied for default stile of panel mask
Applied for content of the panel

ch5-select.description: Top line container (holds selected items and combo trigger button)

ch5-slider.description: the class added on the component and wraps all its contents

ch5-spinner.description: Class apply for the highlight section
Class apply on the active item

ch5-textinput.description: Class apply on the input when size="x-small"
Class apply on the input when size="small"
Class apply on the input when size="regular"
Class apply on the input when size="large"
Class apply on the input when size="x-large"

ch5-toggle.description: the class added on the div that is the only direct child of the ch5-toggle element and wraps all its contents
